## Python Learning Basics to Advance
#### Part 1
  - Output
  - Comments
  - Variables
  - Data Types
  - Numbers
  - Casting
  - Strings
  - Boolean
  - Operators
  - Lists
  - Tuples
  - Sets
  - Dictionaries
#### Part 2
  - if...else
  - match
  - while loops
  - for loops
  - functions
  - range
  - arrays
  - iterators
  - modules
  - json
  - regex
  - pip
  - try......except
  - string formatting
  - none
  - user input
  - virtualenv
#### Part 3 (Classes)
  - OOP
  - class/objects
  - init__method
  - self parameter
  - class properties
  - class methods
  - inheritance
  - polymorphism
  - encapsulation
  - inner classes
#### Part 4(Advanced concept)
  - Numpy
  - Pandas
  - Scipy
  - Django
  - Matplotlib
       - introduction
       - Pyplot
       - Plotting
       - Markers
       - Line
       - Labels
       - Grid
       - Subplot
       - Scatter
       - Bars
       - Histograms
       - Pie charts
